original: Jeppsson, Carl Hjalmar, överstelöjtnant, Visiby, f. 26/12/91! i Ö. Karup, Hall. I, av Sven J. o. Cecilia Petersson. G. 20 m. Edith Hoiltoquis;t. — Stud:ex. v. Hiäkingb. h. a. 1. 11, off :ex. VI Unid:-löjtn. v. God. inf:reg. IB, löjtn. 17, kapt. 28, miajor 38, öv:löjtn. 47. Reg:-kvart :mäst. 31-37, reg: stab sch ef 39-41, stabstygoff. v. VH. mil :bef :staiben o. tygmäsit. på Got’l. 42-47. Led. av styr. f. Gotl. skytteförb. 26-38. RSO, Gotl. skytteförb. förtj :GM.
translated: Jeppsson, Carl Hjalmar, Lieutenant Colonel, Visiby, born on December 26, 1891 in Ö. Karup, Halland, son of Sven J. and Cecilia Petersson. Married on March 20, 19xx to Edith Hoiltoqui, daughter of [unknown]. Education: Secondary school graduate from Hiäkingb. h. a. 1. 11, officer graduate from Uppsala University. Lieutenant in the Infantry Regiment VI 1925, Captain in 1928, Major in 1938, Lieutenant Colonel in 1947. Regimental Quartermaster from 1931-1937, Staff Officer at regimental headquarters from 1939-1941, Staff Officer in the Military Home Guard on Gotland from 1942-1947. Member of the Board of Gotland Shooting Association from 1926-1938. Received the Royal Order of the Seraphim, and the Gotland Shooting Association's Medal of Merit.

awards.name: Gotland Shooting Association's Medal of Merit
